text: Itipurbe tomadera kache i'usupha suspasta pramanadisaha agamana karechila, atahpara tomara tara anita bisaye sandeha'i posana karate. Abasese yakhana se mara gela, takhana tomara balate suru karale, allaha i'usuphera pare ara ka'uke rasularupe pathabena na. Emanibhabe allaha simalanghanakari, sansayi byaktike pathabhrasta karena.
